title: Blueberry Chia Pudding
directions: For the blueberry chia pudding, add cider and honey to chia seeds while whisking making sure there are no clumps. Add remaining ingredients, whisking in periodically. Let sit for two hours or overnight.
For the turmeric apricots, in a small pot over low heat, bring agave syrup to a simmer. Whisk in lime, salt, and turmeric, then pour over apricots and let stand overnight.
For the goji berries, soak goji berries in orange juice overnight.
To serve, top blueberry chia pudding with turmeric apricots, orange-juice-soaked goji berries, and macadamia nuts. Enjoy.
